TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsSignUnspecifiedByte extends System.Object
public ref class IsSignUnspecifiedByte abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示修饰符既非有符号，也非无符号。

span.span: Indicates that a modifier is neither signed nor unsigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些编程语言（例如C++）识别三个不同 `char` 值： `signed char`、`unsigned char`和 `char`。Some programming languages, such as C++, recognize three distinct `char` values: `signed char`, `unsigned char`, and `char`. 为了区分未修改的 `char` 类型，Microsoft C++编译器会将 修饰符添加到发出到程序集的每个 `char` 类型。To distinguish the unmodified `char` type from the others, the Microsoft C++ compiler adds the modifier to each `char` type emitted to an assembly. 编译器在元数据中发出自定义修饰符，以更改当默认行为不合适时实时（JIT）编译器处理值的方式。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到自定义修饰符时，它将按修饰符指定的方式处理值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以对方法、参数和返回值应用自定义修饰符。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以使用以下方法之一将自定义修饰符发送到元数据中：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用 类中的方法，如 、、和 。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令文件，其中包含对的调用 `modopt` 和 `modreq`，并使用[Ilasm （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)汇编文件。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 命名空间中的类创建一个程序集，并将 修饰符发送到该程序集。The following code example creates an assembly using classes in the namespace and emits the modifier into that assembly. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsSignUnspecifiedByte#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsSignUnspecifiedByte/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
